title: High Court Orders Review of VA Voting Rule (Audio)
itunes:title: High Court Orders Review of VA Voting Rule (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Nate Persily, a professor at Stanford University Law School, discusses a Supreme Court decision, which orders a lower court to review its decision on a Virginia voting district. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
